entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
